fitting.name: .Corma. Kill Dagan SOE Epic Arc 1 Alpha

description.value: Alpha Newbie 2 millions ISK (possible to fly just after Starter agents). Ready to begin SOE Epic Arc 1 and finish it, also to farm Greens in founded systems during flights between Arc agent stations. 180 DPS, 5.5k EHP

Fitting courtesy of the Abyssal Lurkers player group.

Join their in-game chat channel Abyssal Lurkers for advice and information about the Abyss.

description.value:
Fitting courtesy of the Abyssal Lurkers player group.

Join their in-game chat channel Abyssal Lurkers for advice and information about the Abyss.
